title.narrative: Women Deliver - Bridging Grant 2020

description.narrative: The strategic objective is, by various means of advocacy, to reach and influence key decision-makers, and promote the uptake of data-driven recommendations on policies and investments related to gender equality in key international NGOs, UN Agencies and countries, with the aim to accelerate progress towards improving the health and rights of women and girl globally and in developing countries. The objective will be achieved through 1) communication and advocacy materials developed and disseminated in Kenya and globally that contribute to shifting the narrative to prioritize gender equality and girls and women’s health and rights, 2) Technical support on gender equality and girls’ and women’s health and rights, including SRHR and the COVID-19 response and recovery, provided to UN agencies and through Women Deliver participation on key task forces and initiatives, and 3) Support to networks of advocates, in order to push for progress on gender equality and girls’ and women’s health and rights, including in the COVID-19 response and recovery, globally and in Kenya.

sector.narrative: Women's rights organisations and movements, and government institutions

description.narrative: FL §06.36.03.11 SRSR activities with international civil society organisations

title.narrative: Output 1.3 Networks of advocates supported to engage in key advocacy moments to push for progress on gender equality and girls’ and women’s health and rights, including in the COVID-19 response and recovery, globally and in Kenya

Deliver for Good KENYA
Indicator 1.3.8: # of Kenya delegates supported to access Generation Equality Forum events
Baseline: 0 Target 2020: 1

Output 1.2 Technical support on gender equality and girls’ and women’s health and rights, including SRHR and the COVID-19 response and recovery, provided to UN agencies and through Women Deliver participation on key task forces and initiatives

Indicator 1.2.2: # of advisory roles (formal and informal) to bilaterals, multilaterals, UN agencies, global partnerships, corporate, and civil society entities, where technical support on gender equality, including SRHR and the COVID-19 response/recovery is provided Baseline: 10 Target 2020: 10 (would have otherwise not been priorities if it had not been for Danish funding)

Output 1.1 Communication and advocacy materials developed and disseminated globally and in Kenya that contribute to shifting the narrative to prioritize gender equality and girls and women’s health and rights

Indicator 1.1.3: # of downloads of Deliver for Good updated briefs and infographics
Baseline: 500 per year Target 2020: 1000 per year (500 new downloads)

Output 1.2 Technical support on gender equality and girls’ and women’s health and rights, including SRHR and the COVID-19 response and recovery, provided to UN agencies and through Women Deliver participation on key task forces and initiatives

Indicator 1.2.1: # of key initiatives, partnerships, coalitions, and taskforces in which Women Deliver participates, where technical support on gender equality, including SRHR and the COVID-19 response/recovery is provided Baseline: 15 Target 2020: 15 (would have otherwise not been priorities had it not been for Danish funding)

Output 1.3 Networks of advocates supported to engage in key advocacy moments to push for progress on gender equality and girls’ and women’s health and rights, including in the COVID-19 response and recovery, globally and in Kenya
